Title: Metzger's Painting Professionals Inc.
Address: 2222 W Parkside Ln STE 119, Phoenix, AZ 85027

summary.snippet: "Good people to work for that offer professional painting services"
"First I commend the employees and the work ethic that they demonstrated."
"Great communication, reasonable price, and very professional paint job."

most_relevant.description: I have had multiple projects done with Metzger Paining over the past 1-1/2 years, both residential and commercial, interior and exterior They have been great. Metzger Paining is my go-to painting contractor from now on. Fantastic quality they make sure they do it right the first time and are always willing to fix anything. Chuck, one of the Superintendent's on some of the projects is always dependable and a great communicator. Carlos worked on some of my projects, and he is a master painter, fantastic quality. Chris is also great to work with and the team in the office are a pleasure and very responsive. Super experience with this company! And LOCAL!

We have seen the work that Metzgers has done for years and knew when we got ready to have our home painted it would be Metzgers for sure! In a day where it is difficult to get quality products and service Metzgers  far exceeds both. We were so pleased with the outcome and although our home in Westbrook is over 30+ years old, it feels fresh and new. Best investment ever to use Metzgers!

Metzger's Painting Professionals Inc. did an outstanding job painting the exterior of my 3,200 sf 2-Story home.  The whole process from start to finish ran with no issues at all.  The painting is top notch and they did a great job cleaning up.  I would highly recommend them for your painting needs whether commercial or consumer!

If you want a job done right, hire Metzger! They removed a large window from my garage and did the drywall inside and stucco outside very professionally. Chuck Jones managed the job. He made sure all my concerns were met. Salim did an excellent job on the drywall inside the garage. I can’t even tell the window was there.

Metzger's Painting did a great job of painting my house and new office! Everyone at the company was very professional and was great to work with! I highly recommend them for any of your residential or commercial jobs!

Chuck, the foreman of my project, was extremely helpful from the first meeting onward. He painted samples on the house and was happy to bring a few more when I asked. His team of painters got the job done as quickly and professionally as they were able to, considering the weather delayed the job by a day. I couldn't be happier with their work and would highly recommend them anytime!

We would recommend you avoid hiring Metzger Painting Professionals.
We hired Metzger for a large $40,000 painting project and were recently told by the owner Jeremiah that he will not finish the job or repair poor workmanship. There are large areas of our house such as the front entry, garage doors and the back of the house that are left unfinished after four months.  Other areas were poorly painted initially with sawdust and debris in the paint, over spray, severe tape damage and lousy coverage in general.
After inspecting the work with his foreman Jeremiah assured us the work was substandard and all the repairs would be addressed. The following day Jeremiah insisted on another $16,000+ to finish the job.
We vehemently disagreed with paying additional money when he had not completed the original contract.
He has many excuses as to why he is not responsible.  This was a large remodel and we have not had this type of difficulty with any other sub on this job.
We are significantly disappointed and offered him every attempt to behave professionally and complete his contract.
For the first time ever, we have filed an official complaint with the register of contractors.

Great communication, reasonable price, and very professional paint job. We will definitely recommend Metzger's to anyone considering exterior home painting. The crew was detailed and left the job site neat and clean. We are very happy with the results.
